Author: Strawberry_Smoothie
Text: White stretchmarks are usually older ones, but anyway: People often recommend moisturizing and massage, which isn't bad, but won't really help. Stretch marks are like scars inside of the tissue, putting some cream on top will do little.  Look into dermarolling and chemical peels, but be aware this is nothing to play around with and can lead to serious skin damage. If at all unsure about your ability to choose the right strength and using it correctly, better pay a professional to do it.
